channel.title: untagged on Karthick-K
channel.description: Recent content in untagged on Karthick-K

item.title: Encrypt Decrypt With Gpg
item.description: This article explains how to encrypt and decrypt files on unix with GNU Gpg Setup GNU gpg Generate Keys gpg --full-generate-key no passphrase Encrypting a file gpg -e -r "karthick" .wekan.json Decrypting the file gpg -o /var/tmp/.wekan.json -d .wekan.json.gpg
